text: Prince Charles of Luxembourg, Prince of Bourbon-Parma and Nassau (born Charles Frédéric Louis Guillaume Marie; 7 August 1927 – 26 July 1977), was a younger son of Grand Duchess Charlotte and Prince Felix of Bourbon-Parma.de Badts de Cugnac, Chantal. Coutant de Saisseval, Guy. Le Petit Gotha. Nouvelle Imprimerie Laballery. Paris. 2002. pp. 666-668, 667-678 (French) ==References== Category:1927 births Category:1977 deaths Category:Luxembourgian princes and princesses Category:Luxembourgian politicians
title: Prince Charles of Luxembourg (1927–1977)
